col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 d-flex

div.h1: A Day of Achievements and Aspirations

div.p: At Softhealer Technologies, we believe in the power of coming together to celebrate accomplishments and set the stage for future triumphs. Heal Station 2024 was an event dedicated to doing just that. It kicked off at 9:00 AM with a heartfelt welcome. This gathering provided an opportunity to reflect on the year’s accomplishments while setting ambitious targets for the year ahead. The event brought together every department, creating a harmonious environment of collaboration and inspiration.

div.class: col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 d-flex align-items-center
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 sh-order

div.p: This year, the Technical Department made significant strides, utilizing Odoo Studio to streamline customizations and enhance efficiency. Key achievements include:

Grouped List-Form and Project Monitors.

One-Click Docker Setup and DB Sync Flow

div.span: Cutting-Edge Features:
3D Viewer, AI Filter, and Contact Relationship Graph

div.p: This year, the Marketplace and Zoho Team excelled in expanding their app offerings and enhancing customer support, driving growth across both platforms:

div.span: Published 130 apps, including key systems.
Improved helpdesk support with a dedicated team and faster migration progress.
Enabled module downloads and support tickets via the customer portal.
Won the Best Team of the Year award.
6 apps were published on the Zoho Store, with 17 more in progress.

div.p: The management team at Softhealer Technologies plays a pivotal role in driving the company’s strategic direction and operational excellence

div.class: row justify-content-center
col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 sh_content_main_div

div.span: Focused on innovation and growth, the team ensures seamless integration of new initiatives, maintains high-quality standards across all services, and fosters a culture of continuous improvement

div.class: col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 sh_content_main_div

div.span: By prioritizing infrastructure upgrades and global expansion, the management team is committed to delivering exceptional value to clients and achieving long-term success

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 sh-order
sh_img_box

div.p: Heal Station 2024 was not just about work and discussions. The event was infused with light-hearted moments and engaging activities that brought the team closer together. Among the highlights were:

div.class: col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12

div.p: A hilarious session where team members guessed the identities of their colleagues based on exaggerated and humorous sketches. Laughter filled the room as everyone tried to identify the faces behind the caricatures.

div.class: col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12

div.p: This classic activity saw team members share lighthearted, anonymous messages or humorous observations about their peers. It was a perfect mix of humor and camaraderie, adding a special touch to the day.

Heal Station 2024 was not just an event but a celebration of our collective spirit and a testament to our achievements. Each department’s reflections and aspirations showcased the shared commitment to innovation and excellence. The fun activities further solidified our bonds as a team. With a clear vision for the future, Softhealer Technologies is poised to embrace new opportunities and continue shining as an industry leader in Odoo solutions.
